description: Once you hit the shore turn to the west and you will see some small sea cave in the distance. the fall and cave are right behind it.  the walk is mostly on cobble and pea size stone.  Lots of cool looking minerals out here.  there is a small fall coming from a cliff top where someone spray painted; shower!The fall itself is a true drop of about 25ft.  Behind it is a large and about 15ft deep sea cave.  Perfect place for a break or pic nic.
directions: Port George on the Bay of fundy.  Continue due west onto Shore Rd. Continue on shore Rd past Ween St and park approximately at 44.973982,-65.209308.  A dirt road from here leads you to the shore.
title: Healy Brook (Keating Beach) Fall and Cave
